name: WP Popup Social Link and Content Share
author: Hamidul Islam

sections.description:
CLICK HERE FOR DEMO

WP Popup Social Link and Content Share is Awesome Social Share Plugin . You can Add Awesome Social Profile Popup Link. It’s too easy to use with ShortCode . You can setting with ShortCode .

Example ShortCode

For Social Profile Link

[socialprofile profile_class="nothing" animation="launchpad" chainAnimationSpeed="100" link="facebook:'hamidul1',google:'102336483082058519992',twitter: 'tolgaergin',pinterest: 'tolga',dribbble: 'bbb',behance: 'gokhun',scoutzie: 'gokhun-guneyhan',inkedin: 'tr.linkedin.com/in/tolgaergin',youtube: 'hamidul'"]Follow Me[/socialprofile]

For Social Share Text

[socialtext animation="launchpad" chainAnimationSpeed="100" social_site="facebook,twitter,google,pinterest,stumbleupon,delicious,friendfeed,digg,linkedin,reddit,yahoo,windows,tumblr,myspace,blogger"]

CLICK HERE FOR DEMO
sections.installation:
1. Use the automatic installation button or upload the ‘plugin-name’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Add ShortCode from post editor visual bar.

CLICK HERE FOR DEMO
sections.faq: if You have any Question Please Ask here ASK QUESTION
